author: Andrew Restuccia
title: Trump Backs Dismissal of USS Roosevelt Captain...
description: Trump Backs Dismissal of USS Roosevelt Captain... (Second column, 3rd story, link ) Related stories: Whistleblower raised alarm about aircraft carrier outbreak... Military recruiting struggles as enlistment stations close... Drudge Report Feed needs your supp…
content:
WASHINGTONPresident Trump said he agreed with the Navys decision to fire Capt. Brett Crozier, the commanding officer of the USS Theodore Roosevelt, after a memo in which the captain pleaded for help with a coronavirus outbreak at sea leaked to the media.
The… [+274 chars]
